title: Trump 'hopeful' for breakthrough at summit: Bolton
text:
Trump 'hopeful' for breakthrough at summit: Bolton 5:35pm BST - 00:52
White House National Security John Bolton said on Sunday that U.S. President Donald Trump is 'hopeful' for a breakthrough at his expected summit with North Korean leader Kim Jong Un. Rough Cut (no
White House National Security John Bolton said on Sunday that U.S. President Donald Trump is 'hopeful' for a breakthrough at his expected summit with North Korean leader Kim Jong Un.
